markdownRemark.html:
I set this up to do a plain weave baby blanket, but threaded for four shaft twill.

When a blanket or two were finished, I grabbed random colors of 5/2 and weaved some twill. The resulting scarf urned out great and I'll do that again, maybe with more or less random colors.

frontmatter.title: 5/2 Perle Cotton @ 12epi Plain Weave and Twill

prev.html: I have been converting my old 4/6 counterbalance to countermarche. With three shafts moving, it was time to see if this thing can weave again. This is a first try with Krogbragd - which uses three shafts. It seems to be working!
